short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your workday with integrated task management and focused work sessions, all within your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Focus by MDS is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your productivity. It combines a to-do list with a Pomodoro timer, helping you manage tasks efficiently while maintaining focus. Beautiful wallpapers add an aesthetic touch, creating a motivating and visually pleasing workspace in every new tab.

Features:

1/ Timer Feature with Breaks:
- Set precise work intervals to maintain focus.
- Automatically transition to rest periods after work intervals to prevent burnout.
- Customize timer settings for personalized productivity sessions.
- Timer works even if your tab is closed.

2/ Fluid To-Do List:
- Organize tasks with subject categorization for better project management.
- Break down tasks into sub-tasks for detailed planning and execution.
- Easily manage and track your progress on complex projects.

3/ Stunning Wallpapers:
- Enjoy beautiful, carefully curated wallpapers with every new tab.
- Transform your browsing space into a source of inspiration and motivation.
- Select from a variety of visually pleasing backgrounds to enhance your workspace.
